Articles.Content: the camera invert Y axis needs work, if i invert Y it will change my cockpit up down to the oposite of what i want, a separate toggle for outside cam and cockpit is needed. the offset function realy needs reworking, fine offset does not work, also just using left stick movement for offset is no good it means you never know what a part will do with the left stick movement, the old way was fine i could look at the directional arrow and click drag. finally if i have selected courser mode why do i need to click the left stick every time i go to space center or enter vab/sph. apart from these issues im very happy with this version. are we looking at months or weeks for a patch or will there be a patch?
